You can look into using PurpleLib, the wrapper library my team has been developing, that integrates AdvantageKit logging into a variety of hardware objects.

GitHub

GitHub - lasarobotics/PurpleLib: Custom library for 418 Purple Haze

Custom library for 418 Purple Haze. Contribute to lasarobotics/PurpleLib development by creating an account on GitHub.

If that’s not the route you’d like to take, it’d help to post the code you have so far, so we can better provide help.
